channel.title: [PI] How to make a random drop from Pking, thieving changes
channel.description:
How do I make it so there's a 5% probability that when a player kills another player, the killer may receive a PvP artefact or PvP armour? I don't need any fancy EP or anything like that, thanks :)
Also where can I change thieving awards?
Thanks :D
